<title level="1" right="Rules">[Step 4: Begin the Next Round](/Rules.aspx?ID=1873)</title>

**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 578

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
After checking for routs, the round is over and the next one begins.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
